tool.name: tl.ROC_AUC_analysis

param.name: groupby
param.label: groupby
param.help: The key of the sample grouping to consider.

param.name: group
param.label: group
param.help: Group name or index for which the correlation matrix for top_ranked genes should be calculated. If no parameter is passed, ROC/AUC is calculated for all groups

param.name: n_genes
param.label: n_genes
param.help: For how many genes to calculate ROC and AUC. If no parameter is passed, calculation is done for all stored top ranked genes.

tool.help:
Calculate correlation matrix.
Calculate a correlation matrix for genes strored in sample annotation using rank_genes_groups.py
Parameters ---------- adata : :class:`~anndata.AnnData` Annotated data matrix. groupby : `str` The key of the sample grouping to consider. group : `str`, int, optional (default: None) Group name or index for which the correlation matrix for top_ranked genes should be calculated. If no parameter is passed, ROC/AUC is calculated for all groups n_genes : `int`, optional (default: 100) For how many genes to calculate ROC and AUC. If no parameter is passed, calculation is done for all stored top ranked genes.
